info.name: Hurawatch (Netflix 2.0)
info.description: This is a style that modifies hurawatch to look like the netflix desktop app
info.additionalInfo:
Current Version: v0.2.3 Beta

v0.2.3:
> Quick fix - Reverted some added ad-blocking which due to added errors.

v0.2.2:
> Search UI fixed to have same Netflix theming 
> Fixed positioning for search bar
> Fallback background shows when image fails to load

v0.2.1:
> Quick fix - Title Header fixed on smaller screens

v0.2.0:
> Updates to the overall red theming including search and the movies page
> Redesign of the movie page
    >> Reordering of the movies
    >> Episodes are given more space for the title
+ extra stability

v0.1.0:
> Initial redesign

COMING SOON:
Mobile compatibility (Kiwi Browser for Android) / Small screen usability
